trends: There have been no other sightings in Voluntown
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: Sighting Detailswas driving me TR7 east on rt 49 heading towards North Stonington when we came to the log mill and i snapped a picture of the setting sun, i didnt notice anything strange in the sky, before during or after the picture. i did not take the picture because i saw the UFO. i simply took it cuz the sunset was cool. when i got home i noticed that there was a UFO in the picture.
Summary: didnt see it in the sky until i got home and looked on the pictures
